mapper.insert:
select uuid() as id from dual
INSERT INTO alipay_bill (id,transaction_number, merchant_order_number, transaction_creation_time, payment_time, last_modified_time, origin_of_transaction, `type`, counterpart, product_name, amount, payment_type, trading_status, service_charge, successful_refund_amount, remark, funding_status) VALUES (#{id},#{TransactionNumber},#{MerchantOrderNumber},#{TransactionCreationTime},#{PaymentTime},#{LastModifiedTime},#{OriginOfTransaction},#{Type},#{Counterpart},#{ProductName},#{Amount},#{PaymentType},#{TradingStatus},#{ServiceCharge},#{SuccessfulRefundAmount},#{Remark},#{FundingStatus})
